japanese:
（今日は色々ありすぎて疲れた……。
　だが、最後の最後でいい夏の想い出を作れたよな）
translation:
(There was so much today, I'm so tired...
 But, we were able to make some nice summer memories
 in the end.)

japanese:
（明日には迎えが来る。
　ようやく元の生活に戻れるのか）
translation:
(They'll come get us tomorrow.
 We can finally get back to our previous lives.)

japanese: や、フータロー君。
translation: Hey, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
ん？　どうした？
みんなと一緒に明日の準備をするって言ったよな。
translation:
Hm? What's up?
You said you were going to prepare for tomorrow
with everyone.

japanese:
うん、もう終わったよ。
あとは寝坊することがないように気をつけるだけ。
translation:
Yeah, we're already finished.
Now all I have to be careful about is not oversleeping.

japanese: お前の場合、そいつが一番の問題だな。
translation: For you, that's the toughest problem, isn't it?

japanese:
その上、困ったことに、まだ撮影の興奮が
冷めてないっていうか……眠れなくて。
translation:
Besides, the trouble is, the excitement of the shooting
hasn't worn off yet... I couldn't sleep.

japanese: だからさ、少し散歩につきあってくれない？
translation: So, would you go on a walk with me for a little?

japanese:
わかった。
夜風にあたれば落ち着くだろ。
translation:
Got it.
The cool night air will calm you down, huh.

japanese: うわぁ、今日も満天の星だね。
translation: Uwaah, another starry sky tonight.

japanese:
また星の観察か？
新しい星を教えてやろうか？
translation:
Looking at stars again?
Shall I teach you a new star?

japanese: 嬉しいけど、それはまた次の機会に。
translation: I'm happy, but let's leave that for next time.

japanese: あのね、君をここに誘ったのは……謝りたくて。
translation:
Um, the reason I brought you here...
was to apologize.

japanese: 俺に謝る？　なんでだよ。
translation: Apologize? Why?

japanese: そんな反応されると、ちょっと言いづらいなぁ。
translation: It's hard to say with a reaction like that.

japanese:
あのね、昨日の私って、フータロー君の
『みんなで楽しみたい』っていう
気持ちを蔑ろにしてたと思うんだ。
translation:
Well, I feel that I made light of your
feelings yesterday, Futaro-kun,
of wanting to 'have fun with everyone.'

japanese:
私も楽しんでるふりをして、
実際は、みんなから一歩、距離を取ってた。
translation:
I was only pretending to have fun,
but actually,
I was distancing myself from everyone else.

japanese: 君だって気がついてたよね。
translation: Even you noticed that.

japanese:
……お前がどうしてそんな態度を取っていたか、
事情は知らない。
translation:
...I don't know the circumstances
behind why you acted like that.

japanese:
あいつらは察してたようだがな。
だが、理由は言いたくないってさ。
translation:
The others were guessing, though.
But, they said they didn't want to tell the reason.

japanese: そう……。
translation: Right...

japanese:
ただ、どんな事情であれ、
お前ら５人は一緒にいて、仲良くしているのがいい。
俺はいつもそう思ってる。
translation:
But whatever the circumstances, it's great
that the five of you are together, and get along.
I've always thought that.

japanese: 一緒かぁ……。
translation: Together, huh...

japanese: ねえ、一緒ってなんだろう？
translation: Hey, I wonder what it is means to be together?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
ただ同じ空間にいること？
それとも同じ価値観を共有していること？
translation:
Does it mean to just be in the same space?
Or to share the same values?

japanese:
よく、同じ空の下、とか言うでしょ？
でも地球の裏側にいる人と一緒にいるなんて
思えないよね。
translation:
We often say we're all under the same sky,
but you can't imagine being with someone
on the other side of the world.

japanese: 一花、ちょっといいか？
translation: Ichika, can I say something?

japanese: えっ――
translation: Huh%p-2;――

japanese:
ちょっ……！
フータロー君、近いよ……これじゃ……。
translation:
Woah!
Futaro-kun, you're so close...right now...

japanese: そうだな、これは『近い』だな。
translation: Yes, this is 'close,' isn't it.

japanese: じゃあ、これはどうだ？
translation: Then, how's this?

japanese: ……離れた、よね。
translation: ...Now you're far away.

japanese: そうだな、これは『遠い』だ。
translation: I see, so this is 'far.'

japanese: ねえ、一体なんのことを言って――
translation: Come on, what exactly are you talking abou%p-2;――

japanese: ひゃっ！
translation: HYAA!

japanese: 改めて確認だが、これは『近い』だ。
translation: Just to reconfirm, this is 'close,' right?

japanese:
……うん。
近いよ……でも……。
translation:
...Yes.
It's close...but...

japanese:
こんな風に近くにいても、遠くに離れても、
俺たちは『一緒にいる』んじゃないか？
translation:
Whether we're close or far away like this,
aren't we 'together'?

japanese: そ、それって、物理的な距離の話じゃなくて……。
translation: W-well, that's not about physical distance...

japanese:
フータロー君が言いたいのは、
気持ちのこと、なのかな？
translation:
What you want to talk about is our feelings,
right, Futaro-kun?

japanese:
そういうことだ。
この先、今のように一緒にいることは
できなくなるかもしれない。
translation:
That's right.
You don't know if you guys can be together
the way you are now from here on out.

japanese:
だが、それがなんだ？
お前たちが五つ子である事実は
いつまでも変わらないだろ。
translation:
But, does that matter?
The fact that you are quintuplets will never change.

japanese:
う、うん！　そうだよね！
わかったんだけど、その、あの……近い……。
translation:
Y-yeah! That's right!
I understand that, but, um...you're so close...

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと？
今の音って……写真撮ったの！？
translation:
H-hold on?!
Was that...a camera shutter?!

japanese:
はっはっは！
お前の素を捉えた最高の１枚が撮れたな！
translation:
HA HA HA!
I took one of the best shots of you!

japanese:
これで、想い出のアルバムの見出し写真は
決まったようなものだ。
translation:
Now, the headline photo
for the memorial album has been decided.

japanese:
不意打ちは卑怯だよ！
消して、絶対変な顔してたから！
translation:
A sneak attack! How cowardly!
I was DEFINITELY making a weird face!

japanese: やなこった！
translation: I'd better run!

japanese:
むう、意地悪しないでよ。
子どもじゃないんだから。
translation:
Grr, don't you be mean.
I'm not a child.

japanese:
今は子どもで結構だ。
どんな抗議を受けようとも、
これは絶対に消さないからな！
translation:
It's fine to be a kid now.
Because, no matter what anyone says,
I'll never erase this picture!

japanese:
いたずらっ子みたいなことをして
お姉さんを困らせないでってば。
translation: Don't you trouble me with your childish antics!

japanese:
くくく……。
早くみんなにも見せてやりたいぜ。
translation:
He-He-He...
I want to show everyone else.

japanese: お前も撮ってただろ。
translation: You were taking pictures too, right?

japanese: 何が？
translation: What?

japanese:
とぼけるな。
俺の寝顔の写真だよ。
あれで何度、脅迫してきた？
translation:
Don't play dumb.
The picture of my sleeping face.
How many times have you threatened me with that?

japanese: あっ……！
translation: Ahh!

japanese:
そ、それはそれ！
軽いジョークなんだし、いつまでも
根に持たないでよ、男らしくない！
translation:
Th-that is neither HERE nor THERE!
It was a simple joke.
Holding a grudge about that isn't manly!

japanese: はあ？　なに開き直ってんだよ。
translation: Huh? What are you getting all fired up for?

japanese:
いたずらっ子みたいなことをして
お姉さんを困らせないでってば。
translation: Don't you trouble me with your childish antics!

japanese:
くくく……。
早くみんなにも見せてやりたいぜ。
translation:
He-He-He...
I want to show everyone else.

japanese: 確認しないでありのまま、だろ？
translation: We keep the pictures just as they are, right?

japanese: ど、どういうこと？
translation: Wh-what do you mean?

japanese:
昼間、撮った写真を確認しようとしたときに
お前がそう言ったんだが？
translation:
This afternoon, when we were about to check the photos,
you said that, didn't you?

japanese:
嬉しいことも、悲しいことも、恥ずかしいことも
全部収めておく、だったな？
translation:
That, you wanted to include all the happy, sad,
and embarrassing things.

japanese:
ううう……。
そんなにしっかり覚えてるなんて、
君っていやらしい……。
translation:
Ooohh...
You are so devious,
able to remember stuff like that...

japanese: なんでいやらしいんだよ！
translation: Why am I devious?!

japanese:
いたずらっ子みたいなことをして
お姉さんを困らせないでってば。
translation: Don't you trouble me with your childish antics!

japanese:
くくく……。
早くみんなにも見せてやりたいぜ。
translation:
He-He-He...
I want to show everyone else.

japanese:
むーっ！
もういいよーだ！　ふんっ！
translation:
Grrr!
Well, do whatever then! HMPH!

japanese:
なんだよ、それ。
どっちが子どもだ。
translation:
What the hell is that?
Who's the child now?

japanese: つーん。
translation: Hmm.

japanese: おーい、そっぽ見てないで機嫌直せよ。
translation:
Hey, don't look the other way.
Cheer up.

japanese:
見て、フータロー君。
月が出てる。
translation:
Look, Futaro-kun.
The moon's coming out.

japanese:
星もだけど、月も、ここで見ると
いっそう、綺麗だよね。
translation:
The stars are nice too, but seeing the moon here
is all the more beautiful.

japanese: 機嫌は直ったのか？
translation: Are you feeling better?

japanese:
そうだね……。
こんな月を見てたら、
どうでもよくなってきちゃった。
translation:
Yeah...
Seeing the moon,
I suddenly stopped caring about things.

japanese: なに見てるの？
translation: What are you looking at?

japanese: い、いや、なんでもない。
translation: N-no, nothing.

japanese: ん～？　もしかして……。
translation: Hm? Perhaps...

japanese: なんだよ。
translation: What?

japanese: 私に見とれちゃってたのかな？
translation: Were you perhaps gazing at me?

japanese:
そ、そんなことありえないな。
たまたま視線の先にお前の顔があっただけだ。
translation:
Th-that's impossible.
Your face just happened to be in front of my vision.

japanese: へ～え、そうなんだぁ。
translation: Uh-huh, is that so?

japanese:
（これは、明らかにバレてるな。
　見とれちまってたって）
translation:
(I've obviously been caught here.
 I was gazing at her, wasn't I.)

japanese:
（さっきの一花は……
　女優でもない、五つ子の長女でもない、
　ただ『中野一花』だと……そんな気がして……）
translation:
(It feels like the Ichika I just saw...
 wasn't the actress, or the oldest sister of the
 quintuplets, just 'Nakano Ichika'...)

japanese:
まだ見てる。
いいの？　せっかくの月を見なくても。
translation:
You're looking again.
Is that alright?
Not looking at the moon while you have the chance.

japanese:
そ、そうだな、うん、月はいいものだからな。
知ってるか、月にある影は日本じゃウサギに
例えられるが海外では違ったりするんだぞ！
translation:
Y-yeah, well, the moon is pretty nice, huh.
You know, the shadow on the moon in Japan
is looks like a rabbit, but it's different overseas!

japanese:
ふーん、そうなんだ。
私は、月と言えばかぐや姫を思い出すね。
translation:
Hmm, is that so.
If we talk about the moon,
first thing I think of is Kaguya-Hime.

japanese:
へえ、だったら今度は
かぐや姫の役でもやってみたらどうだ？
translation:
Oh, in that case,
why don't you try playing Kaguya-Hime next time?

japanese:
お前なら、うまく演じられそうじゃないか。
貴公子たちを見事に手玉に取りそうだ。
translation:
I bet you could depict her really well.
You'd really wrap those young noblemen
around your finger.

japanese:
ふふっ！　それ褒めてるつもり？
それに……。
translation:
Teehee! Are you giving me a compliment with that?
And...

japanese:
そんなこと言って、フータロー君は
私が月に帰っちゃってもいいの？
translation:
Saying that, would you be okay with me going back
to the moon, Futaro-kun?
Wha...

japanese: （芝居の役のこと……だよな？）
translation: (She's talking about a role...isn't she?)

japanese:
おい、一花。
今のって――
translation:
Hey, Ichika.
What you said just now%p-2;――

japanese:
そろそろ戻ろっか。
体が冷えてきちゃったよ。
translation:
Let's head back soon.
I'm getting cold.

japanese: 一花、話を……。
translation: Ichika, listen to me...

japanese:
風邪引いたら困るでしょ？
話があるなら、また今度ね。
おやすみー。
translation:
It'd be no good if we caught colds, right?
If you want to talk, let's do it next time.
Good night.

japanese: （あいつ、一体……どういうつもりで……）
translation: (W-What exactly did she mean by that?)
